sentences.sContent: This means your blood does not clot and you will bleed uncontrollably.
sentences.sContent_eng: This means your blood does not clot and you will bleed uncontrollably.
sentences.sCn: 这意味着你的血液不会凝固，你会控制不住地出血。

sentences.sContent: Not even as I shook and trembled uncontrollably in the trenches, did I forget your face.
sentences.sContent_eng: Not even as I shook and trembled uncontrollably in the trenches, did I forget your face.
sentences.sCn: 即使是当我在战壕中控制不住地颤抖，我也不曾忘记你的容颜。

words.tran: 无法控制的；无法管束的；难以驾驭的

trans.tranCn: 无法管束的, 控制不住的
